author: ahinzmann
body:
#### PR description:

This adds the jet ID selector tuned on UL data for AK4 jets.

Presentation of the CHS criteria for UL17+18: https://indico.cern.ch/event/928283/contributions/3917588/
Presentation of the PUPPI criteria for UL17: https://indico.cern.ch/event/937597/contributions/3940302/

This functor is not used in AOD/MiniAOD, but only in NanoAOD.
No changes from this PR are expected.
This should be picked up in the next UL NanoAOD production.

#### PR validation:

runTheMatrix.py -l limited

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Backport of  #30638.
title: Jet ID for UL [10_6_X]
